mapper.select: SELECT SHOPPER_NO as shopperNo, SHOPPER_ID as shopperId, SHOPPER_PW as shopperPw, SHOPPER_NAME as shopperName, SHOPPER_TEL as shopperTel, SHOPPER_AUTO_LOGIN as shopperAutoLogin, ACTIVATE as activate FROM SHOPPER

SELECT SHOPPER_NO as shopperNo, SHOPPER_ID as shopperId, SHOPPER_PW as shopperPw, SHOPPER_NAME as shopperName, SHOPPER_TEL as shopperTel, SHOPPER_AUTO_LOGIN as shopperAutoLogin, ACTIVATE as activate FROM SHOPPER WHERE SHOPPER_ID=#{shopperId} AND SHOPPER_PW=#{shopperPw}

SELECT SHOPPER_NO as shopperNo, SHOPPER_ID as shopperId, SHOPPER_PW as shopperPw, SHOPPER_NAME as shopperName, SHOPPER_TEL as shopperTel, SHOPPER_AUTO_LOGIN as shopperAutoLogin, ACTIVATE as activate FROM SHOPPER WHERE SHOPPER_NO = #{shopperNo}
